item.title: Reaper: What We Know So Far
item.description: Reaper will be a new job coming to Final Fantasy XIV in the Endwalker expansion. As of September of 2021, we only know a few things about Reaper, and as we learn more we will update this page. Gameplay Here are the following gameplay mechanics we know about Reaper: It will be a melee DPS They will wield a Scythe as its main weapon and will use the “Maiming” armor, similar to DRG.
